problem_text_cn: 如图,小雅家(图中点O处)门前有一条东西走向的公路,经测得有一水塔(图中点A处)在她家北偏东60度500m处,那么水塔所在的位置到公路的距离AB是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is an east-west road in front of Xiaoya's house (point O in the figure), and it is measured that there is a water tower (point A in the figure) at N_0 degrees N_1 east of the north of her house, then the location of the water tower The distance to the highway AB is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了方向角含义,正确记忆三角函数的定义是解决本题的关键．
